item.title: Using GitHub Pages to Create a Blog
item.author: Levent Kaan Oğuz
item.description: Prerequisites GitHub Account: You can open one from here. Hugo Installation: You should follow the instructions appropiate for your system here. A Preffered Choice of Theme: You can of course build your own theme but it is better to choose one from here. For instance, I use LoveIt theme. Love for phys… just kidding, the other thing we need is to desire for this website.
